title: Journal
subtitle: A place to honestly record your days: good, normal, and hard.
newEntryPlaceholder: What do you want to register about today?
newEntryHint: You can write a few sentences or just mark your mood.
moodBalanceHint: The goal is not a perfect mood chart, but noticing how you actually felt.
noEntriesFilter: There are no entries for the selected filter / search.
noEntriesExport: There is nothing to export yet.
entryAdded: Entry has been added to your journal.
tip: Tip: long-press an entry to delete.
noTextWarning: Write at least one line or choose a mood.
